item.title: 投资者面临 "资产饥荒"，中国债券市场蓬勃发展
item.description: 中国主权债务的破纪录反弹正进入白热化，这再次表明中国金融体系信心不足，现金和银行存款泛滥。【原文：A record-breaking rally in Chinese sovereign debt is hitting a fever pitch in another sign China's financial system is low on confidence and overflowing with cash and bank deposits.】

item.title: 俄罗斯增加供应，航油需求引发谨慎，油价走低
item.description: 油价在上一交易日上涨后，周二早盘有所回落，部分原因是俄罗斯供应可能增加，以及航空燃油等行业的下游需求可能低于预期。【原文：Oil prices edged down early on Tuesday after gaining in the previous trading session, due in part to the prospect of rising supply from Russia as well as the possibility of slower-than-expected downstream demand in sectors such as jet fuel.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称，富达国际计划裁减16%的中国基金部门职位
item.description: 基金管理公司富达国际（Fidelity International）正计划在其主要的中国业务部门裁员20人，两位熟悉内情的消息人士透露，此举正值该公司全球裁员和中国市场低迷之际。【原文：Fund manager Fidelity International(FIL) is planning to lay off 20 people at its main China business unit, two sources familiar with the matter said, a move that comes amid a global downsizing by the firm and a downturn in China's markets.】

item.title: 日本股市下跌，日元持稳，市场为日本央行具有里程碑意义的转变做好准备
item.description: 周二，日本股市随地区市场下跌，而日元在日本央行即将召开的关键会议上保持稳定，这次会议可能会结束长达八年的负利率，并迎来日本自 2007 年以来的首次政策紧缩。【原文：Japanese shares fell on Tuesday along with regional markets, while the yen was steady heading into a pivotal Bank of Japan meeting that could end eight years of negative interest rates and usher in the nation's first policy tightening since 2007.】

item.title: 澳大利亚商界领袖将会见中国外长
item.description: 澳大利亚商界领袖将在堪培拉会见中国外交部长，他们表示，澳大利亚对其最大的贸易伙伴缺乏了解，他们将寻求了解中国政府如何看待华盛顿，这对贸易往来 "至关重要"。【原文：Australian business leaders are set to meet China's foreign minister in Canberra, saying their country lacks knowledge of its biggest trading partner and that they will seek insight on how Beijing views Washington, which is "critical" to trade flow.】

item.title: 新日铁承诺将美国总部迁至美国钢铁公司匹兹堡总部
item.description: 一位高管表示，如果交易成功，新日铁将把其美国总部迁至匹兹堡，而收购目标美国钢铁公司就在匹兹堡。【原文：Nippon Steel would move its U.S. headquarters to Pittsburgh where its acquisition target U.S. Steel is based if the deal goes through, an executive said, adding to the pledges from the Japanese steelmaker to secure the transaction.】

item.title: 美国国税局局长认为三年内员工总数将突破 10 万人
item.description: 美国国内税收署署长丹尼-韦费尔（Danny Werfel）周一表示，税务机构需要在未来三年内将员工人数增加到十万人以上，以实现其现代化、服务和执法目标，并需要额外的资金来维持额外的能力。【原文：Internal Revenue Service Commissioner Danny Werfel said on Monday that the tax agency will need to boost its workforce to over 100,000 people over the next three years to achieve its modernization, service and enforcement goals and additional funding will be needed to maintain that extra capacity.】

item.title: 英伟达的新软件工具旨在帮助企业将人工智能应用到业务中
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia）周一发布了一款软件，旨在使企业更容易将人工智能系统纳入其工作，从而扩大该芯片制造商的产品范围。【原文：Nvidia on Monday unveiled software aimed at making it easier for businesses to incorporate artificial intelligence systems into their work, broadening the chipmaker's offerings.】

item.title: 日本央行决议在即，日元坚挺；美元回升
item.description: 周二，日元兑美元汇率跌至150美元附近，但在日本央行（BOJ）作出关键性政策决定之前，日元汇率保持稳定。【原文：The yen dwindled near the 150 per dollar level on Tuesday but held its ground ahead of a pivotal policy decision from the Bank of Japan (BOJ), while the U.S. dollar towered over its peers as bets for early rate cuts there were trimmed.】

item.title: 自由港首席执行官：美国必须改进铜矿开采许可程序
item.description: 铜业巨头弗里波特麦克莫兰公司（Freeport-McMoRan）首席执行官周一表示，如果美国希望增加国内关键矿物的供应，为清洁能源转型提供动力，就必须改进其矿山开采许可程序。【原文：The U.S. must improve its mine permitting process if it hopes to boost domestic supplies of critical minerals to power the clean energy transition, the CEO of copper giant Freeport-McMoRan said on Monday.】

item.title: 2023 年欧洲专利申请创历史新高
item.description: 欧洲专利局（EPA）登记簿周二显示，该局去年收到的专利申请数量创下历史新高，其中来自美国、德国、日本和中国的专利申请最多。【原文：The European Patent Office (EPA) received a record number of patent applications last year, with the biggest share of fillings coming from the United States, Germany, Japan and China, the office's register showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 Boral 公司敦促股东拒绝 Seven 集团 13 亿美元的收购要约
item.description: 澳大利亚博罗（Boral）公司周二以估值问题为由，敦促股东们拒绝多元化投资者Seven Group Holdings提出的19亿澳元（12.5亿美元）收购这家建筑产品集团制造商剩余股份的报价。【原文：Australia's Boral on Tuesday urged shareholders to reject diversified investor Seven Group Holdings' A$1.9 billion ($1.25 billion) offer for the remaining stake in the building products group maker, citing valuation concerns.】

item.title: 消息人士称，美国将最终确定修订后的电动汽车里程评级规则，汽车制造商将获胜
item.description: 消息人士称，美国能源部（DOE）将于周二公布最终规则，该规则将大幅弱化其为满足政府2027年燃油经济性要求而削减电动汽车（EV）里程评级的提议。【原文：The U.S. Energy Department (DOE) on Tuesday is set to unveil final rules that will significantly soften its proposal that would have slashed electric vehicles' (EV) mileage ratings to meet government fuel economy requirements in 2027, sources said.】

item.title: Nvidia 加入生成式人工智能，为仿人机器人提供动力
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）周一发布了一个用于制造类人机器人的硬件和软件平台，其中包括生成式人工智能功能。【原文：Nvidia on Monday announced a hardware and software platform for building human-like robots that includes generative artificial intelligence features.】

item.title: 汽车人工智能竞赛白热化，英伟达扩大与中国电动汽车制造商的联系
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）周一表示，它正在扩大与比亚迪和其他中国汽车制造商的合作，这些公司正在竞相打造自动驾驶汽车和人工智能增强信息娱乐技术，以参与全球市场竞争。【原文：Nvidia said on Monday it is expanding its collaborations with BYD and other Chinese automakers that are racing to build self-driving vehicles and AI-augmented infotainment technology to compete in global markets.】

item.title: Nvidia 推出基于云的研究平台，用于 6G 研究和测试
item.description: Nvidia 周一发布了一个人工智能驱动的软件平台，通过在云中模拟通信环境，对 6G 技术进行研究。【原文：Nvidia on Monday unveiled an AI-powered software platform that allows research into 6G technology through simulating communications environments in the cloud.】

item.title: 早间竞标：世界等待日本央行的焰火，科技滋补品
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 传感器制造商 TE Connectivity 将管辖权转移至爱尔兰
item.description: 传感器制造商 TE Connectivity 周一表示，将把公司注册地从瑞士改为爱尔兰，并计划与其爱尔兰分公司合并。【原文：Sensor maker TE Connectivity said on Monday it would change its jurisdiction of incorporation to Ireland from Switzerland and plans to merge with its Ireland unit.】

item.title: 克罗格将向 Elevance Health 的 CarelonRx 出售专科药房业务
item.description: 杂货商克罗格公司周一表示，已就向美国医疗保险公司 Elevance Health 旗下的 CarelonRx 出售其专业药房业务达成最终协议。【原文：Grocer Kroger said on Monday it had entered a definitive agreement for the sale of its specialty pharmacy business to CarelonRx, a unit of U.S. health insurer Elevance Health .】

item.title: 星巴克任命高管担任新设立的全球领导职位
item.description: 星巴克周一宣布了新的全球领导架构，任命迈克尔-康威（Michael Conway）为北美地区首席执行官，任命布雷迪-布鲁尔（Brady Brewer）为星巴克国际首席执行官。【原文：Starbucks announced a new global leadership structure on Monday, appointing Michael Conway as CEO of the North America region and Brady Brewer as the CEO of Starbucks International.】

item.title: 美国标准机构称字节舞团研究员被错误加入人工智能安全群聊
item.description: 美国国家标准与技术研究院（NIST）周一表示，TikTok 的中国所有者字节跳动公司（ByteDance）的一名研究人员上周被错误地加入了美国人工智能安全专家的群聊。【原文：A researcher from TikTok's Chinese owner ByteDance was wrongly added to a groupchat for American artificial intelligence safety experts last week, the U.S. National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) said Monday.】

item.title: 美国机构调查福特致命车祸中驾驶辅助系统的使用情况
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周一表示，已开始调查最近在得克萨斯州圣安东尼奥市发生的一起福特野马 Mach-E 致人死亡的车祸，当局怀疑事故中使用了高级驾驶辅助系统。【原文：The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Monday it has opened an investigation into a recent Ford Mustang Mach-E fatal crash in San Antonio, Texas, where authorities suspect an advanced driver assistance system was in use.】

item.title: 美国官员将于周三向参议员通报 TikTok 带来的威胁 - 助理
item.description: 一名委员会助理周一告诉路透社，美国国家安全官员将于周三为商务委员会和情报委员会的参议员举行一次简报会，介绍外国对手利用美国敏感数据（包括与中国拥有的 TikTok 相关的数据）所造成的威胁。【原文：U.S. national security officials will hold a briefing on Wednesday for senators on the Commerce and Intelligence committees on threats posed by foreign adversaries’ exploitation of American’s sensitive data, including related to Chinese-owned TikTok, a committee aide told Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司加快股票回购步伐
item.description: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）加快了回购自身股票的步伐，这表明长期担任董事长的沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）认为这些股票的价值被低估，是花费多余现金的好地方。【原文：Berkshire Hathaway has increased its pace of repurchasing its own shares, a sign that longtime Chairman Warren Buffett considers them undervalued and a good place to spend excess cash.】

item.title: 对冲基金行业组织就国债市场交易商规则起诉美国证券交易委员会
item.description: 代表私人基金管理行业的贸易团体周一起诉美国证券交易委员会（SEC），控告其要求经常交易政府债券和其他证券的公司注册为经纪商的规定。【原文：Trade groups representing the private fund management industry sued the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) on Monday over a rule requiring firms that routinely deal in government bonds and other securities to register as broker-dealers.】

item.title: 日本央行将取消负利率并结束收益率曲线控制 - 日经新闻
item.description: 据《日经新闻》周一报道，日本央行将在周二举行的董事会上决定结束收益率曲线控制和购买风险资产，同时17年来首次转向引导利率上升。【原文：The Bank of Japan is set to decide on ending its yield curve control and purchase of risk assets while moving to guide interest rates higher for the first time in 17 years at its board meeting through Tuesday, Nikkei newspaper reported on Monday.】

item.title: 纽约联储报告显示，2 月份有更多美国人申请抵押贷款
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行周一公布的新数据显示，近几个月来，美国人申请抵押贷款的人数有所增加，尽管他们在获得这些贷款时面临着更大的困难。【原文：Americans applied for mortgage credit in greater numbers over recent months even as they faced greater headwinds in getting those loans, new data from the Federal Reserve Bank of New York released Monday said.】

item.title: 美国将在年底前将紧急石油储备恢复到先前水平
item.description: 美国能源部长詹妮弗-格兰霍尔姆（Jennifer Granholm）周一表示，美国战略石油储备（SPR）的石油库存在年底时将达到或超过两年前大规模出售前的水平。【原文：U.S. oil stocks in the Strategic Petroleum Reserve (SPR) at year-end will be at or exceeding the level that would have existed prior to massive sales two years ago, U.S. Energy Secretary Jennifer Granholm said on Monday.】

item.title: Model Y 在美国和欧洲涨价后特斯拉股价上涨
item.description: 特斯拉汽车公司宣布在一些欧洲国家和美国提高其 Model Y 电动汽车的价格，特斯拉股价周一上涨了近 7%。【原文：Shares of Tesla rose by nearly 7% on Monday after the automaker announced price increases for its Model Y electric vehicles across some European countries and the United States.】

item.title: 马斯克在新视频中为自己使用氯胺酮辩护，称这对投资者有利
item.description: 特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周一在网上发布了一段与美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）前主播唐-莱蒙（Don Lemon）的视频访谈，称他的氯胺酮处方对特斯拉的投资者有益。【原文：CEO Elon Musk said his ketamine prescription was beneficial for Tesla's investors in a video interview with former CNN anchor Don Lemon posted online on Monday.】
